remarks: For any family of sets, define the poset of that family ordered by inclusion.  See ~ ipobas , ~ ipolerval , and ~ ipole for its contract. _EDITORIAL_:  I'm not thrilled with the name.  Any suggestions? (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 30-Jan-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)

$d f o x y $.
